'''''Fading Veteran''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Blubberbeast Local Legend|text=Fading Veteran — The Grand Fleet's Gravekeeper|link=Blubberbeast}}.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Fading Veteran can be found in the waters between [[Beryl Region]] and [[Belleau Region]], close to a Teleport Waypoint.
